label: Population
description: long-run human population over time stitched from multiple sources

label: Life Expectancy
source: Riley (2005), Clio Infra (2015), and UN Population Division (2019)

label: GDP per capita
description: long-run GDP per capita measured in constant 2011 international $
source: Maddison Project Database 2020 (Bolt and van Zanden, 2020)
